channel.title: Pallavi V G
channel.description: Recent content on Pallavi V G

item.title: $ whoami
item.description: Hello world, I’m Pallavi 👋🏼! I write code, lift weights, and never say no to a spontaneous adventure 👩🏻‍💻💪🏼⛰️. With over 4 years of experience in backend development, I love building things that work smoothly and geeking out over how to make systems even better. When I’m not in front of a screen, I’m either smashing shuttlecocks 🏸, hitting the gym, or chasing my wanderlust wherever it takes me. Cold brew in hand ☕, gym bag in the other—I’m all about balance, whether it’s life or code!

item.title: Contact me
item.description: I would be available on LinkedIn or Telegram. Best would be ping me there for relevant things, please don’t spam me. For any formal correspondence, Email: pallavivg98@gmail.com
